description:
Using Picovico, you can convert photos into videos in following easy steps:

  • Sign up for an account or login via your Facebook/google+ account

  • Verify email and log in 

  • Select a style

  • Add photos, video clips and text slides under a particular music

  • Click the ‘Create’ button to make a video

  • Personalize the video content and finalize


You can leave your freshly minted video of awesomeness on site for public viewing or share it on Facebook or YouTube or embed it on your website or blog. You can also download and save a copy on your desktop.


Please go through this video for a walk-through of how to create a video with Picovico:
description_text:
Using Picovico, you can convert photos into videos in following easy steps:  
  Sign up for an account or login via your Facebook/google+ account  
  Verify email and log in   
  Select a style  
  Add photos, video clips and text slides under a particular music  
  Click the ‘Create’ button to make a video  
 Personalize the video content and finalize 
     You can leave your freshly minted video of awesomeness on site for public viewing or share it on Facebook or YouTube or embed it on your website or blog. You can also download and save a copy on your desktop.   Please go through this video for a walk-through of how to create a video with Picovico:
title: How do I get started?
